name: TenFeetTall-MotivationandInspiration
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Join a young man who was diagnosed with a rare form of dwarfism at the age of 2, Brandon Farbstein, to start your day right with gratitude, motivation, inspiration, happiness, and so much more :) 

Standing at 3'9" Brandon has fought adversity and bullying most of his life and has come close to taking his life. But on the other side of suffering is greatness and after feeling small and without purpose for the first 15 years of his life, Brandon has now found his calling on stage and social media platforms to continue to fight for others and change the lens though which people see the world. 

Now bringing his message and voice to the Amazon Alexa, Brandon Farbstein continues to touch the lives of many through inspiration, stories, self help, empowerment, motivation, hope, strength, mindset and an uplifting mood, showing just how BIG he really is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
